import './ExpenseItem.css' function ExpenseItem(props) { const expnDate = props.date const expnTitle = props.title const expAmount = props.amount let options = { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long' } return (
{expnDate.toLocalString('en-US', { month: 'long' })}
Year
Date

{expnTitle}

{expAmount}
) } export default ExpenseItem
